entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 7:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 6.3°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
